thread.title: Seattle Seahawks vs. Carolina Panthers: Start time, TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Seattle Seahawks vs. Carolina Panthers: Start time, TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Seattle Seahawks vs. Carolina Panthers: Start time, TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
The Seattle Seahawks enter their critical game against Carolina needing to answer one big question: Have they moved past their stunning collapse in the loss at Cincinnati last week? The answer will come when they host the unbeaten Panthers Sunday afternoon (KPTV-12, (FOX), 1 p.m. PT/4 p.m. ET) .
Whether the Seahawks are prepared mentally for the Panthers or still suffering from a hangover from Cincinnati is just one issue. The Seahawks defense has cracked late in four of the five games this season, leaving some people to wonder if its reign as a dominant defense has passed. The offense and quarterback Russell Wilson will receive boost by the return of running back Marshawn Lynch . Lynch is expected to play after missing two games with an injured hamstring.
Carolina quarterback Cam Newton and the Panthers are unbeaten, but few are convinced they are on the same level as Green Bay, Arizona or even the Seahawks. Their wins have come against mediocre and bad teams, so they have an opportunity to make a strong statement in the game against Seattle.
if you want to watch the Seahawks host the Panthers, here's what you need to know:
What : Carolina Panthers at Seattle Seahawks
Where : CenturyLink Field, Seattle, WA
When : Sunday, Oct. 18, 1 p.m. PT/4 p.m. ET
TV : KPTV-12 (Fox)
Watch online : You can watch the live stream onlive on DirecTV's live stream package
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
